name: Fayzul Noor
bio: I am a goal-driven AI Automation Engineer focused on designing and implementing intelligent automation solutions and AI-powered agents. By leveraging platforms such as n8n, Make.com, and Zapier, I help businesses streamline workflows, reduce operational costs, and drive innovation that fuels revenue growth. My approach combines process optimization with AI integration, delivering measurable ROI and scalable systems that work smarter for my clients.
